singleItemContent: What would you do to relax?
Do you think doing sports is a good way to relax?
Do you think vacation is a good time to relax?
Do you think students need more relaxing time?
Describe a person you know who is talented
How and where you knew this person
Why you think he/she is talented
And explain how you found out that he/she is talented
How do you think schools should help children develop their talents?
What do you think of talented people and AI?
Have you ever had any experience with things related to AI?
Do you think AI will replace human beings?
